115.content:
Jake drove slowly up the dark suburban street, squinting at the house numbers as he passed. He found the one he was looking for at the end of the street. He eyed the drawn curtains in the windows nervously as he parked in front of the house, thankful that Richard had done him the courtesy of at least leaving the porch light on. Not for the first time, Jake hesitated, bewildered that this was actually happening. He had never met up with someone from the internet before, let alone a man older than his own father. What if he had something sinister planned for him? If the old man had been telling the truth during their chats, Jake would be palm-sized in a matter of minutes -- and at that size, he would be extremely vulnerable. If Richard's warm, gentle demeanor online was merely an act and he actually sought to hurt Jake for some reason, there would be very little the tiny man could do to stop it. Plus, he had taken great pains to keep this rendezvous a total secret from everyone he knew, so no one would have any idea where he'd gone off to. Indeed, this entire adventure was seeming more and more foolhardy with every passing minute, and Jake nearly threw his truck back into gear and went back the way he came.

But he couldn't bring himself to do it. After all, he'd been talking to Richard about this for a while now, and he hadn't ever felt any twinges of suspicion during their talks. And this was his greatest fantasy realized, a dream he had never dared to believe could come true; it would be such a waste to just throw away this opportunity. It was reckless, yes, but he simply couldn't resist the temptation to actually experience being tiny in the hands of a giant. So, trying and failing to calm his racing heart, Jake got out of his truck and made his way up the path to the front door of the house.

When he raised his fist to knock, the door swung open on its own, revealing a foyer dimly lit by candles. Jake's heart leapt to his throat, but with some effort, he was able to clear it enough to call out, "Richard? Are you there?" He took a tentative step over the threshold into the house when a light suddenly burst forth from the darkness. It struck his chest like a physical force, knocking the breath out of him, and he stumbled and fell. When he opened his eyes, blinking the blinding spots out of his vision, he faintly registered that the ceiling seemed curiously far away. With a groan, he sat up -- and froze. Looking around at his gigantic surroundings, Jake immediately realized that he was much, much smaller than he was supposed to be.

Just how tall is Jake now?
115.title: Richard, the 60-year-old man

1152.content:
Jake rose shakily to his feet, staring around in shocked silence. The mere sensation of being so minuscule, so insignificant in a room designed for beings many times his own size sent a thrill through Jake's entire body, particularly in his pants. He had little time to take in the spectacle of the giant foyer, however, before loud, rhythmic booms scattered his already racing thoughts. His wide eyes snapped to the dim living room up ahead just in time to see an impossibly huge figure emerge from the darkness.

It was definitely the Richard that Jake had been talking to, aside from the difference in relative size. He was a big man, probably very muscular in his prime but now carrying some excess weight. His silver hair was still full and wavy, and he sported a clean beard to match. Bushy gray fur was visible on his chest, as he wore nothing save a silk bathrobe and a pair of cotton socks. The giant stepped forward, looming like a skyscraper above the tiny young man, and smiled warmly down at him. "Welcome to my home, Jake," he rumbled, his voice a deep baritone. "I thought it would be more exciting for you if the first time you saw me in person was as a giant. I hope I didn't startle you too much."

At last, Jake was able to make his mouth work properly. "But... how?" he called up to the giant.

Richard laughed and held up...

11521.content:
Richard held up a funny-looking gun with a digital display. Of course, thought Jake; the size ray had been mentioned during their online chats, but at the time, Jake admittedly didn't entirely believe that such a thing could actually exist. Indeed, when he decided to come here, he had obviously been hopeful that their talk of size change was more than just fanciful role-playing, but he was prepared to accept that reality and enjoy a fun evening with Richard nonetheless. But it was real, and now that he had had a few moments to digest his new situation, Jake couldn't help but grin right back up at the giant before him.

His smile must have been the signal Richard was waiting for, because the next thing he knew, the old man was striding toward him. In one startlingly swift motion, he bent down, wrapped his thick fingers around Jake's tiny figure, and lifted him high into the air like the world's best amusement park ride. Richard held him close to his face, and Jake felt even smaller than before as his great, blue eyes observed him curiously. But the crinkles of a smile remained at their corners, and Jake felt himself relaxing in the giant's grip. "How do you feel?" the colossal man murmured gently.

"Th-this is... incredible!" Jake gasped, resting his arms upon the finger that coiled around his chest like a massive python. "I didn't think it was really possible, but... you're huge!"

Richard let out an amused chuckle. "Quite the contrary," he rumbled, turning and beginning to walk. "You're just tiny!"

Jake twisted around in the giant's fist to see that they were going to...

115211.content:
Richard entered the living room and Jake stared around in awe. There wasn't anything particularly special about the room itself, with its simple furniture and quaint decor, but its sheer size left Jake practically breathless. He still couldn't quite wrap his head around the fact that he was now the size of a mouse, so small and insignificant in a vast new world. The fingers that coiled around his body squeezed him gently, and he looked up to see Richard's face smiling warmly down at him. Even though this was the first time they had ever met in person, Jake felt strangely at ease under the old man's gaze, and he felt his body relaxing in his grip.

Richard took a seat on the couch and carefully deposited Jake onto the coffee table next to a bottle of wine and two glasses. Jake stumbled a little bit, but quickly regained his balance and turned to look up at the giant, rendered speechless by the spectacle before him. Richard popped open the wine bottle and poured two glasses. He winked down at Jake, who was looking up at the giant wine glasses in confusion -- How the hell am I supposed to drink this? -- and lifted up the shrink ray once more. There was another blinding flash of light, and when Jake managed to blink the spots from his vision, one of the glasses had been miniaturized to suit him.

As much as he had fantasized about this exact sort of situation, the reality of being shrunken down to mere inches and being with a giant man made Jake rather nervous, and as a result he gulped down his whole glass of wine in record time. Richard raised his bushy eyebrows and chuckled. "So that's how we're doing it, eh?" he said playfully, and in one swift motion he downed his entire glass, too. With a smirk on his face, he refilled both of their glasses, briefly restoring Jake's to its original size to do so.

Although he was a young, American college student, Jake wasn't usually much of a drinker, and had always been a bit of a lightweight. Even so, it seemed that shrinking had lowered his tolerance for alcohol even further, because after just a couple of glasses, he was already feeling rather drunk, and the sight of the titanic man sitting across from him didn't send that instinctual pang of fear through him anymore. Instead, he eyed Richard hungrily, struggling to take in every inch of this man who towered above him. Relative to Jake, he was larger than any living thing should be, more massive than was normally possible. But now that Jake was shrunken down to a measly three inches tall, it seemed like just about anything was possible. The thought set the little man's heart racing, and he wanted nothing more than to fling himself at the mountainous old man in front of him and make the fantasies he'd been harboring for so long come true.

The sight of the tiny man swaying drunkenly and staring up at him with such undisguised lust made Richard laugh heartily. He knew exactly what kind of effect he was having on Jake, as they had discussed each of their own deepest desires at length in their previous conversations. Truthfully, this situation turned Richard on as much as it did Jake, and the sight of the shrunken young man down there on the table was making his cock harden under his robe. He had owned the shrink ray for quite some time now, but this was the first time he had ever actually shrunk another person. He wasn't selfish enough to just kidnap some random passerby, and until he found Jake on that macrophilia website, he had never known anyone personally who shared his fetishes and would be willing to participate in them. But Jake was special; not only did they have the same taboo interests, they had a certain chemistry together that was palpable even through the computer. From early on, Richard had been eagerly anticipating this moment, and now that it was here, he was ready to have some fun. To get things started, Richard...

info.brief_description: A guy who secretly wants to shrink meets someone online who can make his dreams a reality.
info.description:
Jake is an average 21-year-old college student with a hidden fetish for giants. When he starts talking to someone on the internet who claims to be capable of bringing his kinks to life, he can't resist the opportunity.

Just about anything goes except:
- scat/watersports
- anyone under 18
- vore of any kind
- growth (this is a shrinking story!)
- gore/death

Remember, Jake wants to be shrunk and his new friend, although nearly a stranger, is not cruel or violent towards him. The smallest size he can shrink is 1 inch. Chapters breaking any of the rules here will be deleted.

Other than that, have fun!
